tool_description: This API is an intensive NBA Player API offering complete accounts for all active NBA player games.
title: NBA Player Individual Stats

api_list.name: Get Players By Team
api_list.description: Get players in the database by their team name.

api_list.name: Get Player Season Games By Player Id and Season Year
api_list.description: This will retrieve all of a players games by the player Id and the season.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-player-individual-stats.p.rapidapi.com/playerseasongames/player/{id}/{season}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-player-individual-stats.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Teams
api_list.description: This will retrieve all teams in the database.

api_list.name: Get Players By FirstName
api_list.description: Retrieve all players in the database by first name.

api_list.name: Get Players By Database Player ID
api_list.description: This allows player retrieval directly by the Player Id in the database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-player-individual-stats.p.rapidapi.com/players/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-player-individual-stats.p.rapidapi.com"

api_list.name: Get Players By LastName
api_list.description: This will retrieve all players in the database by lastname.

api_list.name: Get Player Seasons By Player Id
api_list.description: This will grab all of the regular seasons a player has played in.

api_list.name: Get Player Games By Player Id
api_list.description: This will retrieve all games a player has played.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-player-individual-stats.p.rapidapi.com/playerseasongames/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-player-individual-stats.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Player By Full Name
api_list.description: This endpoint will get a player by the name matching given firstname_lastname.
